journeys.title: Confident rollouts without reader-side inconsistency
journeys.value_proposition: Roll out and roll back runtime flag state safely while preserving consistent reads.

journeys.title: Trusted snapshot ingestion with typed failure paths
journeys.value_proposition: Turn configuration payloads into typed runtime materialization with clear boundary failures.
